title: Create your Password Manager
info_1: Store here all your passwords, data or any other type of information, forget about paper notes and not protected applications
info_2: Create your master key: Only you are allowed to check its information
how_it_works_content: Firstly, you must create a new different password for your technological belongings. You won't be allowed to recover your password, so be sure you will remember it.
what_can_be_saved_content: For instance, your credit card number, PIN, or PUK of your smartphone, your gadget's serial number o any other type of information you need to have it in a safe place.
hint: You can also create a hint in order to help you to remember the master password
hint_label: Create your hint for remembering your password (Optional)
hint_error: Hint must have least than 255 characters
error_content: We could not update your master password. Try again in several minutes.
success_title: Your master password is now created!
regex_failed: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter and a digit.
password_not_min_length: Password must have at least 8 characters
